rows.label: bf11210150_0010
rows.name:
It has been a while, Prince Adel.
I ask your forgiveness for the rudeness of my soldiers.

rows.label: bf11210150_0020
rows.name: Not at all, don't worry about it.

rows.label: bf11210150_0022
rows.name:
It's good to see you in good health,
Your Majesty, Emperor Hugo.

rows.label: bf11210150_0030
rows.name: Hugo... the Emperor...?

rows.label: bf11210150_0040
rows.name: Allow me to introduce him...

rows.label: bf11210150_0050
rows.name:
His Majesty Hugo El Superbia, 
Emperor of the Superbian Empire.

rows.label: bf11210150_0060
rows.name: The Superbian Emperor...

rows.label: bf11210150_0070
rows.name: What's someone so important doing here?

rows.label: bf11210150_0080
rows.name: Our positions are pretty similar, you know...

rows.label: bf11210150_0090
rows.name: As if you actually think that.

rows.label: bf11210150_0100
rows.name: You can tell? As I thought.

rows.label: bf11210150_0110
rows.name: We're here for the Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf11210150_0120
rows.name:
We've started seeing damage in Superbia, too.
We were tracking him when we found you.

rows.label: bf11210150_0130
rows.name: So, same reason as us, then.

rows.label: bf11210150_0140
rows.name: But for you to come personally...

rows.label: bf11210150_0150
rows.name: My brother is in charge back home.

rows.label: bf11210150_0160
rows.name:
I see... And you brought Kagutsuchi
and Wadatsumi with you.

rows.label: bf11210150_0170
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]?

rows.label: bf11210150_0180
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi and Wadatsumi are the Crown Jewels
of the Empire. Our imperial banners.

rows.label: bf11210150_0190
rows.name:
It is the duty of the heir to the throne to lead
them into battle on the front lines.

rows.label: bf11210150_0200
rows.name:
By rights,
the throne should have gone to my older brother.

rows.label: bf11210150_0210
rows.name: But your brother wasn't suited to be a Driver.

rows.label: bf11210150_0220
rows.name: And then, of all things, you...

rows.label: bf11210150_0222
rows.name: ended up resonating with both of them.

rows.label: bf11210150_0230
rows.name:
The Special Inquisitor.
He reports directly to my brother.

rows.label: bf11210150_0240
rows.name: Oh.

rows.label: bf11210150_0250
rows.name:
He is ordered to retrieve Kagutsuchi's and
the other's Cores if I die on the battlefield.

rows.label: bf11210150_0260
rows.name: Even though he's your family?

rows.label: bf11210150_0270
rows.name: That's just how rulers are.

rows.label: bf11210150_0280
rows.name: And yet.

rows.label: bf11210150_0282
rows.name: I think it's for the best this way.

rows.label: bf11210150_0290
rows.name:
It's my dearest wish to be able
to fight to protect my people.

rows.label: bf11210150_0300
rows.name: I was never fond of wielding authority anyway.

rows.label: bf11210150_0310
rows.name:
I couldn't agree more. I'll never understand
people who actually want to sit on a throne.

rows.label: bf11210150_0320
rows.name:
If His Highness Zettar were to hear that,
you wouldn't get away with it, you know?

rows.label: bf11210150_0330
rows.name: Oops. Let's just pretend I didn't say that.

rows.label: bf11210150_0340
rows.name:
We never get to do what we want, do we?
I just wish they'd leave us be.

rows.label: bf11210150_0350
rows.name: They're scared, of the existence known as human beings.

rows.label: bf11210150_0360
rows.name:
They probably see them as some kind
of unknowable monsters.

rows.label: bf11210150_0370
rows.name:
Never realizing that they're
just looking in a mirror...

rows.label: bf11210150_0380
rows.name: Prince Adel.

rows.label: bf11210150_0382
rows.name: Please, call me Hugo, like in the old days.

rows.label: bf11210150_0390
rows.name:
Very well, Hugo.
In that case, you can just call me Adel.

rows.label: bf11210150_0400
rows.name:
Now, I'd like to exchange information,
but perhaps we should find somewhere else to talk.

rows.label: bf11210150_0410
rows.name: How about His Majesty's royal ship?

rows.label: bf11210150_0415
rows.name: Sounds good.

rows.label: bf11210150_0420
rows.name: Royal ship?

rows.label: bf11210150_0430
rows.name: Is something the matter, Laura-sama?

rows.label: bf11210150_0440
rows.name: I'm not good with those kinds of stiff, formal places.

rows.label: bf11210150_0450
rows.name: Ah, I know, I know! I'm the same way.

rows.label: bf11210150_0460
rows.name: Right?!

rows.label: bf11210150_0462
rows.name:
For that reason,
I think I'll have to decline.

rows.label: bf11210150_0470
rows.name: Then me too[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf11210150_0480
rows.name: Oh no you don't.

rows.label: bf11210150_0490
rows.name: Could it be... is she the one from the rumors?

rows.label: bf11210150_0500
rows.name:
Yes. The other Heaven's Holy Grail,
Hikari.

rows.label: bf11210150_0510
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf11210150_0520
rows.name:
I'd really like to have you hear
Laura's story as well, but...

rows.label: bf11210150_0530
rows.name: Shin knows everything I've seen and heard.

rows.label: bf11210150_0540
rows.name: Well... yeah, I guess that's true, but...

rows.label: bf11210150_0550
rows.name: Please, go for me.

rows.label: bf11210150_0560
rows.name: Understood. I will accompany them.

rows.label: bf11210150_0570
rows.name: I'll be in your care.

rows.label: bf11210150_0572
rows.name: Then let's go.
